info.title: The Machine Realization of the Periphrasing System and the Results of the Experiment

text: The ilichine realization of the periphrasing system and the results of the experiment.
Arsentyeva (Moscow) The paper is devoted to the machine realization of the periphrasing system devised by I.A.
Geolcovsky According to the idea of the semantic nature of a synthesis a deep sentence structure is used as input data for the periphrasing system.
By the given rules which are makhing up as a matter of fact the periphrasing system the other sentence deep structures are obtained from the given deep structure, being equivalent by meaning.
Both the machine realization of the periphrasin system and the experiment carried out wiqg intended to verify and to check out both the periphrasing system and the realization programs.
Further the specified version of the periphrasing system is supposed to be included in a general system of a Russian semantic synthesis used for the machine translation.
The notions used in the periphrasing system are shortly described.
The detailed description of the semantic and syntac-tid rules is given.
A paragrapher is devoted the detailed description of the machine dictionary ( s. the paper of I.A.Mel'chuk and J. D. Apresyan).
The work of the algorithm is illustrated by some examples.
